name: Integrate Dropbox – Manage, Browse, Slider, Media Player, Embed, Download, View Your Dropbox Files Into Your WordPress Site
author: CodeConfig

sections.description:
Experience Smooth integration between Dropbox and WordPress with the most user-friendly Dropbox plugin for WordPress like Google Drive. Effortlessly manage and share your Dropbox documents and media files directly on your website. With just a few clicks, you can browse files, create galleries, download, view, and display content without any coding hassles.

Don‚Äôt miss out on the best way to manage your Dropbox files! Get your Dropbox files in front of your audience quickly and easily with this must-have plugin.

üëÅÔ∏è See Features Details | üöÄ Get PRO

‚úÖ FREE FEATURES ‚úÖ

‚öôÔ∏è Easy Setup – Effortlessly Setup! With this plugin, just add Dropbox App and Secret Key from your Dropbox account to authorize Dropbox Account and WordPress integration. Documentation

üë∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Shortcode Builder – The WordPress Shortcode Builder lets users easily create and customize modules like Media Player, Slider, File Browsers and Galleries, Download & Embed links etc. Users can insert the generated shortcode anywhere on their site, offering flexibility and ease of use without needing extensive coding knowledge.

üåÜ Gallery – Gallery allows you to create a gallery to display images and videos in an interactive way. Showcase your content beautifully and engage your audience with a visually appealing presentation.

üõ†Ô∏è Shortcode Module – Shortcode Module allows you to easily select and insert built-in shortcodes from a dropdown menu, streamlining the process of adding custom features to your website.

üìÑ Embed Documents – Embed your Dropbox documents directly into your WordPress website.

üîó Download Links – Allow your e-commerce, Digital Product customers to download media and document files.

üëÅÔ∏è View Links – Protect your important files by allowing customers to only view them without downloading.

üë∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Gutenberg Builder – Incorporate Customizable Slider, Media Player, Gallery, File Browser, Download links, view links Modules seamlessly into your website using the Gutenberg builder.

üõü Preloader – Choose from our selection of predefined preloader to enhance your website’s loading experience.

üåà Customize Backend Colors
Easily customize the colors of your website’s backend using our predefined options.

üì± Responsive Design
The plugin ensures your File Browser, Gallery, Upload Box, or Media Player module looks great on both desktop and mobile devices, providing a seamless user experience.

*üì≤ Use Own Dropbox App**
You can utilize your own Dropbox app for a seamless and personalized experience with the plugin. üé¨ Watch Video

‚öôÔ∏è Reset Settings: Reset your current settings for the built-in tools to their default configurations.

üöÄ PRO FEATURES üöÄ

Media Library – Seamlessly integrate Dropbox with the WordPress Media Library, allowing users to access Dropbox files directly from the Media Library tab. This integration supports file access within the Classic Editor, Featured Images, Galleries, and more.

üñ•Ô∏è File Browser – “Browser Files Dropbox” is a feature that allows users to access and manage their Dropbox files directly through a web browser interface, offering convenience and accessibility from any device with internet access.

üéµ Media Player – Allows you to play your Dropbox media files in a custom player. It comes with awesome customizable settings, giving you control over the look and functionality of the player. Easily integrate your Dropbox content and enjoy a tailored media experience.

üõù Slider Carousel – Slider Carousel lets you create sliders that you can fully customize. You can adjust how they look and work to fit your needs, making it easy to showcase images, videos, or content in an attractive and engaging way.

‚ôæÔ∏è Add Unlimited Shortcode – Easily create and name custom shortcode to integrate your website’s content anywhere you need it. It’s compatibility with Astra, Hello Elementor, Divi, Avada, GeneratePress etc.

üõü Use Preloader Utilize a variety of awesome preloader by selecting your preferred style for your website’s loading animation.

üé® Customize Color Tailor your backend colors to your preferences with complete customization options.

üß© RICH INTEGRATION WITH POPULAR PLUGINS

üîÄ Gutenberg Block Editor Integration
Integrate Dropbox allow 7 blocks for using File Browser, Gallery, Media Player, Slider, View and Download link modules in the Gutenberg editor.

üîÄ Elementor Website Builder Integration
This plugin integrates with Elementor, offering over 7 widgets for File Browser, Gallery, Media Player, Slider, View and Download link modules.

üéØ Basic Usage

üëâ Link a Dropbox Account
After activating the plugin, you’ll need to link your Dropbox account to it. This allows the plugin to access your Dropbox files and folders for integration with your WordPress site.

üëâ Shortcode Builder
You can create various types of modules (File browser, Gallery, Embed Documents, Download Links, View Links) with different configurations with the shortcode builder and can use them anywhere using the shortcode.

üëâ Embed Documents
You can embed any Dropbox files to your page/ post using the shortcode builder and using the editor button.

üëâ Insert Download/ View Links
You can insert direct links in any page/ post to download and view any Dropbox files.

Data Privacy

This Application is using the your Dropbox App & Secret Key information when you authentication and link the Application with your Dropbox Account.

üåè CodeConfig Privacy Policy

‚ÑπÔ∏è IMPORTANT: All communications between your server and the cloud storage service servers are strictly encrypted and do not pass through our servers. We do not collect or have access to your files.

üìöDOCUMENTATION & SUPPORT

Documentation

Support

**Video Tutorials

Website

üî• WHAT‚ÄôS NEXT üî•

Check out our other plugins:

üåô Dusky Dark Mode
The Best Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress admin or manually upload the integrate-dropbox folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the Integrate Dropbox plugin through the ‚ÄòPlugins‚Äô menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Dropbox Developers app console
  4. Press the blue button Create app.
  5. Choose ‚ÄòDropbox API‚Äô for Step 1.
  6. Choose ‚ÄòFull Dropbox‚Äô for Step 2.
  7. Set a unique app-name (e.g., [site-prefix]-codeconfig) for Step 3.
  8. Copy and paste your APP key and App secret into the login screen, then submit credentials.
  9. Add the auto-regenerated redirect URL from the login screen to App > Settings > OAuth 2 > Redirect URLs, then click on the add button.
  10. Add the necessary permissions from the Permissions tab.
  11. Finally, click on the sign-in button to authorize with your Dropbox account.

Integrate Dropbox is now installed and configured. Documentation | Video
sections.changelog:
1.1.3 (26/08/2024)

  • New: * Big Update * Added Media Library Integration
  • New: Select Specific Folder from media integration
  • Fix: Fix File loading issue
  • Update: Optimize style issue on Elementor Editor

1.1.2 (09/08/2024)

  • New: Added Media Player Module
  • Fix: Fix Elementor Editor Issue
  • Update: Optimize style issue on Elementor Editor

1.1.1 (06/08/2024)

  • Fix: Module builder preview rendering issue
  • Fix: Fix default view permission issue
  • Fix: Gutenberg shortcode modules preview issues
  • Update: Optimize style issue on Elementor Editor

1.1.0 (05/08/2024)

  • New: Added Elementor widgets integration
  • New: Added Shortcode module in page builder
  • Fix: Give option to add User’s Dropbox App
  • Update: Optimize file loading time
  • Update: Update Modules Settings

1.0.5 (06/07/2024)

  • New: Added Slider Carousel in shortcode module
  • Fix: Resolved JS conditional issue
  • Update: Optimized and cleaned code

1.0.4 (04/07/2024)

  • New: Added Gutenberg File Browser Module
  • New: Added Gutenberg Embed Documents Module
  • New: Added Gutenberg Download Links Module
  • New: Added Gutenberg View Links Module
  • Update: Optimize Database.
  • Update: Update Gallery Module Settings

1.0.3 (19/06/2024)

  • Fix: Resolve PHP error.
  • Update: Update Required PHP version

1.0.2 (08/06/2024)

  • Fix: Fix Gallery module error.

1.0.1 (06/06/2024)

  • New: Integrate Gutenberg Gallery module
  • New: Added Preloader and Color settings
  • New: Added View links module in shortcode.
  • New: Shortcode location in shortcode list page.
  • Update: Mega Update On UI style
  • Update: Updated Shortcode Builder with Gallery settings
  • Update: Optimize Performance
  • Fix: Fix Gallery module shortcode issue in frontend.

1.0.0 (28/04/2024)

  • Initial release.

integrate-dropbox/slider-carousel.name: integrate-dropbox/slider-carousel
integrate-dropbox/slider-carousel.title: Slider Carousel
integrate-dropbox/slider-carousel.description: Create a slideshow of images or videos from your Dropbox

integrate-dropbox/gallery.name: integrate-dropbox/gallery
integrate-dropbox/gallery.title: Gallery
integrate-dropbox/gallery.description: Insert a mansory grid gallery with lightbox preview to display Dropbox image and videos.

integrate-dropbox/view-links.name: integrate-dropbox/view-links
integrate-dropbox/view-links.title: View Links
integrate-dropbox/view-links.description: Insert links to view the files in Dropbox

integrate-dropbox/embed-documents.name: integrate-dropbox/embed-documents
integrate-dropbox/embed-documents.title: Embed Documents
integrate-dropbox/embed-documents.description: Embed Dropbox documents to your page/ post

integrate-dropbox/download-links.name: integrate-dropbox/download-links
integrate-dropbox/download-links.title: Download Links
integrate-dropbox/download-links.description: Insert links to download Dropbox files.

integrate-dropbox/file-browser.name: integrate-dropbox/file-browser
integrate-dropbox/file-browser.title: File Browser
integrate-dropbox/file-browser.description: Insert a file browser to browse specific Dropbox files and folders
